name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior DevSecOps Engineer with 13+ years of experience in building secure, scalable, and reliable platforms across the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **AWS**, **Kubernetes**, **Terraform**, **AWS CDK**, **Jenkins**, **Docker**, and **Helm** for deploying cloud-native applications and managing infrastructure. Skilled in **DevOps**, **SRE**, and **Platform Engineering** practices, ensuring high availability and performance while adhering to compliance standards such as **SOC 2**, **FedRAMP**, and **ISO 27001**.
Hands-on expertise in **Python** for automation and orchestration, as well as **Bash** and **Go** for scripting and tooling. Experienced in implementing secure CI/CD pipelines and managing event-driven architectures. Additionally, I have a solid foundation in MLOps, including AI/ML model training and deployment using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, aligning innovative solutions with regulatory requirements.
